txt.en: '[placeholder], I fear the road below may be watched too closely for our company to move as secretly as our purpose requires. To this end, I have sent some of my kindred west into the Gloomglens to seek a less travelled path into the south.\n\n'We need your aid here, but when all is ready, you should head to Echad Idhrenfair in the Gloomglens and speak with Idhrenfair himself. I am certain he could use your help scouting the way.'
'Welcome, [placeholder]. Saeradan sent you to aid us? That is well, for these myriad gorges are a mystery to be unravelled. Your aid will be greatly appreciated.'
'Echad Idhrenfair lies to the west in the Gloomglens.'
Saeradan fears that the road south into Dunland may be watched too closely, forcing the Rangers of the Grey Company to seek a safer route to Rohan.
Talk to Idhrenfair at Echad Idhrenfair
Idhrenfair is at Echad Idhrenfair in the Gloomglens, north and west of Echad Saeradan.\n\nSaeradan has suggested you might help Idhrenfair seek a more secret path southwards.
